page.title: 08LEISURE AND RECREATION CONT.
page.content: Littlehampton Swimming Centre Littlehampton Swimming Centre is situated alongside Mewsbrook Park and was opened in 1983 by Princess Alexandra. The Centre is run for the community by Arun District Council and has a main pool, a shallow pool, three squash courts, a health and fitness suite, meeting room and refreshment area. The main pool roof is shaped like an upturned boat. The shallow pool with steps and a ramp is for learners, young children and the handicapped. Both pools have deck- level sides and ozone water purification. The Centre organises lessons for all ages and has special fun/sessions with inflatables. You can also learn canoeing, windsurfing and snorkelling. During its first two years the Centre received over 600,000 visits.
